title: What is the prescribed age to keep beard for teenager boys? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: Med what is the prescribed age to keep beard for teenager boys there is no prescribed age a male must not shave his beard so even if he's a child of 10 years of age he should not run a blade across his face and he if he reaches puberty at the age of 13 or 14 he should not touch his beard at all
